statements: SELECT * FROM TraditionalMediaDistributionChannels;
SELECT channel_id, distribution_platform FROM TraditionalMediaDistributionChannels;
SELECT channel_name, content_type FROM TraditionalMediaDistributionChannels WHERE distribution_platform = 'TV';
SELECT * FROM TraditionalMediaDistributionChannels WHERE content_type = 'Magazines' ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT channel_id, channel_name, distribution_platform FROM TraditionalMediaDistributionChannels WHERE channel_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM TraditionalMediaDistributionChannels WHERE channel_name = 'TV Channel'
SELECT * FROM TraditionalMediaDistributionChannels WHERE content_type = 'News' ORDER BY channel_name DESC
SELECT channel_name, content_type FROM TraditionalMediaDistributionChannels WHERE distribution_platform = 'Cable TV' AND content_type LIKE 'Sports%'
SELECT channel_name, distribution_platform FROM TraditionalMediaDistributionChannels WHERE content_type = 'Movies' AND distribution_platform NOT LIKE '%flix'
SELECT * FROM TraditionalMediaDistributionChannels WHERE channel_name = 'Radio Channel' AND content_type = 'Music'
SELECT * FROM distribution_channels;
SELECT channel_name, subscription_fee FROM distribution_channels WHERE subscription_fee > 50;
SELECT * FROM content_providers ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, contact_info FROM content_providers WHERE provider_name LIKE '%Media%';
SELECT SUM(subscription_fee) AS total_fee FROM distribution_channels;
SELECT * FROM distribution_channels WHERE subscription_fee > 1000 ORDER BY channel_name DESC
SELECT channel_name, content_type FROM distribution_channels WHERE content_type = 'Video'
SELECT provider_name, contract_start_date FROM content_providers WHERE contract_start_date > '2022-01-01' AND provider_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY contract_start_date
SELECT * FROM distribution_channels DC INNER JOIN content_providers CP ON DC.channel_name = CP.provider_name
SELECT channel_name, subscription_fee FROM distribution_channels WHERE subscription_fee BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY subscription_fee ASC
SELECT channel_name, content_type FROM DistributionChannel;
SELECT title, genre FROM Content WHERE is_premium_content = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT channel_name, content_type FROM DistributionChannel WHERE channel_id = 1;
SELECT title, genre FROM Content WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT * FROM Tracking WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_id, title, genre FROM Content WHERE genre = 'Action' AND is_premium_content = TRUE;
SELECT channel_name, content_type FROM DistributionChannel ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Tracking JOIN Content ON Tracking.content_id = Content.content_id WHERE Tracking.channel_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT channel_id) AS total_channels FROM Tracking;
SELECT * FROM distribution_channels;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM distribution_channels ORDER BY channel_name ASC;
SELECT content_id, content_name, release_date FROM content WHERE content_type='Movie';
SELECT company_name, country FROM media_company WHERE industry_type='Streaming';
SELECT * FROM distribution_records WHERE views > 1000 ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM distribution_channels;
SELECT content_id, content_name, release_date FROM content ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT c.content_name, d.channel_name, d.views FROM content c JOIN distribution_records d ON c.content_id = d.content_id WHERE d.views > 1000;
SELECT company_name, industry_type, country FROM media_company WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY company_name;

SELECT channel_name, COUNT(record_id) AS total_records FROM distribution_channels JOIN distribution_records ON distribution_channels.id = distribution_records.channel_id GROUP BY channel_name HAVING total_records > 5;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM TraditionalMediaCompanies;
SELECT content_name, category, release_date FROM Content ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT channel_id, channel_name, platform FROM DistributionChannels WHERE platform = 'Streaming';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM TraditionalMediaCompanies WHERE industry = 'News';
SELECT log_id, user_id, content_id, timestamp FROM AccessLogs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM TraditionalMediaCompanies;
SELECT * FROM Content ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM TraditionalMediaCompanies WHERE industry = 'Media';
SELECT content_name, category FROM Content WHERE category = 'Entertainment' AND release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT channel_name, platform FROM DistributionChannels ORDER BY channel_name ASC;
